entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
